title: $1500 CUTE 1 BR-715 BERWYN AVE-UTILITIES INCL EXCEPT ELECTRIC
description:
Excellent neighborhood and close to shopping and the train.
The house is in a convenient location close to all the restaurants and shops in Berwyn. Convenient to the train and bus service to Villanova, Wayne, Bryn Mawr and Philadelphia. Close walking distance to R-5 train- two short blocks. Walking distance to local Pubs, Brewery and many restaurants. Library just a few blocks away.
This unit has a living room area with an eat in dining area.
Cute kitchen with a dishwasher, refrigerator and garbage disposal. One bedroom one bathroom with the washer/dryer
There is a covered Front Porch. Parking in rear of property in addition to available street parking. Maximum two cars.
The Rent includes Heat, Internet, Water, Sewer, and Trash pickup. Tenant is responsible for electricity. Tenants use window AC's.
This house is in a convenient location close to all the restaurants and shops in Berwyn-Walking distance to R-5 train.
Close to Wayne, King of Prussia, Malvern, Great Valley Corporate Center and Convenient to Villanova University. Less than 10 minutes to routes. 202, 422, PA turnpike, 76 and 476.
Rent is $1500 per month for one year lease. First and last month’s rent needed plus $1000 refundable security deposit. A move out cleaning fee of $150.00 and carpet cleaning $200 required 60 days prior to lease termination. This is a non-smoking and child free environment. Acceptable credit score and References required. Any questions, please feel free to contact me. These units have historically been rented by young professionals and couples. Rent is due on the 1st of the month.

title: Holy Cow! Walk to all you need from this Art Museum 1 bed 1 bath apt!
description:
2038 Spring Garden St #3 – Available now
Incredibly well proportioned 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apt with office den bids a functional living experience with a comfortable blend of modern conveniences and historic elegance. Restored vintage hardwood flooring throughout, high vaulted ceilings, and classic outlines of quality trims & moldings illustrate picturesque accents of the past, whilst ample natural light illuminates the timeless character. Both the kitchen & bathroom maintain a youthful glow outfitted in modern aesthetic, per recent renovations. High-quality finishes, new cabinets, granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas stove and microwave create a beautifully updated venue for channeling your inner chef in the kitchen. A sleek vanity, contemporary fixtures and full sized bathtub/shower are some of the modern aesthetics that create a serene atmosphere.
The bedroom, well, absolutely stunning; a faux fireplace, tons of natural light and spacious closets integrate nicely within this impeccable sanctuary. Working from home? The 4 seasons room with wrap around windows and amazing natural light that connects wonderfully off the exterior of the unit, a perfect space for an at home office.
Vibrant location just blocks from the Philadelphia Museum of Art, Whole Foods, Kelly Drive, and countless other attractions such as shopping, restaurants, bars, gyms, highways, public transit and more. Walk to Kelly drive for your daily workout, walk to center city for work, or walk to the grocery store for all your grocery needs. A great place to live!!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Sauna, Package Room, Gym, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2512 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street and South Philadelphia. Be the first to enjoy a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom! This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home will have wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Bella Turka, Ritual Shoppe, Tselaine, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, Veda, The Love, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Bluestone Lane. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop for produce and flowers at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There are many banks in the neighborhood, including TD Bank in the building. This building has the best location!

title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Concierge
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 2015 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 20th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Bella Turka, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Nail Spa Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Pick up fresh flowers for your home at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square

* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 20th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

title: 3 Bed/1.5 Bath home ** Central A/C,  front/back yards + Laundry! **
description:
Make yourself at home in this beautiful 3 bedroom 1.5 bathroom house on a nice, quiet, tree-lined block in the heart of Fishtown!
This home features a great light-filled kitchen with modern appliances (including central air and laundry), good sized living spaces and private outdoor areas both in front and out back to entertain and spend time cultivating your patch of earth, plus a side corridor for easier trash days (don't underestimate this part!).
The first floor takes you through the living room from the front door, straight into the dining room lined with exposed brick, and then to the kitchen with beautiful backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of space for your culinary imagination. Walk upstairs and find all 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom with handcrafted vanity/vessel sink combo.
The basement is clean and semi-finished and can be used as a creative space or storage area and includes a laundry room plus a 1/2 bath.
On top of the amenities, this location can't be beat - only a few minutes' walk to Loco Pez, Atlantis, Memphis Taproom, Pizza Brain/LittleBaby's, Philadelphia Brewing Company, Martha - and close to everything Fishtown has to offer, from transportation to highway access to restaurants, coffee shops and more!
Rent is $2025 per month for a 12-month lease or $1975 a month for an 18-month lease. First month's rent due at lease signing. Two month's for security deposit is required at key exchange (no last month's rent). Pets subject to landlord approval on a case-by-case basis. Would require a $500 REFUNDABLE pet deposit and $25/mo pent rent.
Tenant pays electric and gas. Landlord covers water up until $100/mo (avg is $70/month). Any overage is billed to tenant. Laundry is in-unit and requires no coins to operate!
$45.00 per person Non-Refundable application fee
Available November 1st!

title: Experience city living in this charming & sun-filled Townhome
description:
Available Now for rent in Queen Village. Experience city living in this charming & sun-filled Townhome located in Queen Village featuring 3 bedrooms & 1 1/2 bathrooms. Arrive home to an open floor plan ideal for entertaining family & friends. You will be delighted with the open floor plan for the living room and dining, recessed lighting & hardwood floors on the first & second floor. The beautiful eat-in kitchen is equipped with Refrigerator, Microwave Oven, Range, Hood & Dishwasher with plenty of cabinetry for storage & countertops for creating your culinary delights. Added bonus of first floor 1/2 bathroom. Access provided to the spacious rear yard from the kitchen. The patio is a wonderful space for grilling and relaxing. The first floor is graced with original hardwood flooring and the second floor of the home is naturally filled with sunlight. Second floor features 3 spacious bedrooms plus 1 full bathroom. The bathroom is beautifully updated & offers a tub/shower combination and vanity. Access to the basement provides plenty of storage. There is a laundry which includes washer and dryer. The home was recently renovated in the last 2 years and offers newer plumbing, electric, HVAC to include Central Air Conditioning. Prime location in desirable Queen Village neighborhood. Daily errands do not require a car as this is a walker’s paradise. With an amazing Walk Score of 98, Transit Score of 70 & Bike Score of 81. You will enjoy living in this home & will appreciate all of amenities that that neighborhood has to offer. Just moments to Meredith, venture to nearby Shots Tower coffee, Weccacoe playground, Mario Lanza park, restaurants along E Passyunk Ave & South St Super easy access to Delaware Ave, Old City, Ben Franklin Bridge & I-95. Easy access to nearby shopping; Target, Home Depot, TJ Maxx & Home Goods, Acme Market all along Delaware Ave. First month rent, last month rent and security deposit is required. Tenant is responsible for all utilities.

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: Great value in Fairmount! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. title: 3xx cross street row home
description:
2 Beds 2.5 Baths -
This 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home was completely renovated in 2016 and has been impeccably maintained ever since. This home is located on a quiet, low traffic block in the heart of Pennsport. The bright and open living room features recessed lighting and beautiful bamboo floors that continue through out. Past the dining area you'll find a modern kitchen with white shaker style cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a tile backsplash with under cabinet lighting, granite countertops and a breakfast bar. Out back is a large yard, great for entertaining. The finished basement, with a half bath and separate laundry area, serves as an additional gathering space. Upstairs there's a bright guest bedroom and full hall bathroom. The master suite has two closets and a tiled bathroom with a large vanity and glass enclosed shower. This house is a block from Dickinson Square and Herron Playground is around the corner. Coffee shops and restaurants such as Grindcore House, Herman's Coffee, Moonshine Philly, and (the original) Federal Donuts are only a short walk away. Shopping in Queens Village and on Delaware Ave are also close by.

title: Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease!
description: Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease! The first level of the home is the garage that spans the length of the home followed by the rear yard that can be used for gardening, relaxing and entertaining. Up the stairs you have the main level of the home that is completely open with massively tall ceilings and incredible natural light. The tiered level has the living and dining space on the lower level and full kitchen with eat in nook on the upper level. The kitchen has been recently remodeled with new countertops and fixtures. The top level features three bedrooms, stackable laundry closet, hall bathroom and a brand new primary bathroom. The primary bathroom is jawdropping with accented barn door, wall to wall mirrors, gorgeous tiling, waterfall shower and free standing tub. Through the primary bedroom is access to the green roof deck. The roof deck is lined with succulents to make it a true "green" roof, has panoramic views of the city, and tons of space for get togethers. Lastly, but perhaps the biggest selling point is the prime location in fishtown right off of Frankford ave and next to Palmer park. The home is just steps away from some of the best dining/restaurants in the city such as Suraya, Wm Mulherin's & sons, Pizzeria Beddia and La Colombe. This is a rare rental in a perfect location. **Owner would like to keep the back parking spot for his wood work space but could be leased for an additional $200 per month. Home can be rented furnished for an additional $200 per month.
